Lauderhill.Miami Regional University: Miami Regional University (MRU) is a private university located in Miami Springs, FL. MRU is accredited by Accrediting Council of Independent Colleges and Schools (ACICS). Although ACICS has lost its accreditation ability with U.S. Department of Education (USDOE), the USDOE continues to recognize MRU until June 2018. During this period, MRU must apply and be approved by a new accrediting body to continue its "accredited” status with the department.
